languages.text: "Вношу в протокол попытку манипуляции должностным лицом. Маршал, надеюсь, мне не понадобится напоминать вам о долге?" {n}Смерив Стракса настороженным взглядом, префект возвращается к документам.{/n}

"Let a new charge be added to the record: attempting to manipulate an official. Marshal, I hope I do not need to remind you of your duty?" {n}Giving Strachs a suspicious look, the prefect turns back to the documents.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вношу в протокол попытку манипуляции должностным лицом. Маршал, надеюсь, мне не понадобится напоминать вам о долге?" {n}Смерив Стракса настороженным взглядом, префект возвращается к документам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Let a new charge be added to the record: attempting to manipulate an official. Marshal, I hope I do not need to remind you of your duty?" {n}Giving Strachs a suspicious look, the prefect turns back to the documents.{/n}

"Let a new charge be added to the record: attempting to manipulate an official. Marshal, I hope I do not need to remind you of your duty?" {n}Giving Strachs a suspicious look, the prefect turns back to the documents.{/n}

"Let a new charge be added to the record: attempting to manipulate an official. Marshal, I hope I do not need to remind you of your duty?" {n}Giving Strachs a suspicious look, the prefect turns back to the documents.{/n}

"Let a new charge be added to the record: attempting to manipulate an official. Marshal, I hope I do not need to remind you of your duty?" {n}Giving Strachs a suspicious look, the prefect turns back to the documents.{/n}

"Let a new charge be added to the record: attempting to manipulate an official. Marshal, I hope I do not need to remind you of your duty?" {n}Giving Strachs a suspicious look, the prefect turns back to the documents.{/n}

languages.text: "Lasst uns einen weiteren Anklagepunkt hinzufügen: Versuchte Manipulation eines Amtsträgers. Marschall, ich hoffe, ich muss Euch nicht an Eure Pflicht erinnern?" {n}Die Präfektin wirft Strachs einen misstrauischen Blick zu, ehe sie sich wieder den Dokumenten zuwendet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Let a new charge be added to the record: attempting to manipulate an official. Marshal, I hope I do not need to remind you of your duty?" {n}Giving Strachs a suspicious look, the prefect turns back to the documents.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lasst uns einen weiteren Anklagepunkt hinzufügen: Versuchte Manipulation eines Amtsträgers. Marschall, ich hoffe, ich muss Euch nicht an Eure Pflicht erinnern?" {n}Die Präfektin wirft Strachs einen misstrauischen Blick zu, ehe sie sich wieder den Dokumenten zuwendet.{/n}

languages.text: « Qu'une nouvelle accusation soit ajoutée au dossier : tentative de manipulation d'un magistrat. Maréchal, j'espère ne pas avoir à vous rappeler vos devoirs ? » {n}lance la préfète à Strachs avant de se replonger dans ses documents.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Let a new charge be added to the record: attempting to manipulate an official. Marshal, I hope I do not need to remind you of your duty?" {n}Giving Strachs a suspicious look, the prefect turns back to the documents.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Qu'une nouvelle accusation soit ajoutée au dossier : tentative de manipulation d'un magistrat. Maréchal, j'espère ne pas avoir à vous rappeler vos devoirs ? » {n}lance la préfète à Strachs avant de se replonger dans ses documents.{/n}

languages.text: “我们可以在罪名清单上加上一条新的指控——试图操纵帝国官员。您的职责所在，想必不需要我提醒吧，元帅？”{n}行政官狐疑地看了斯塔克斯一眼，之后将目光移回了卷宗上。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Let a new charge be added to the record: attempting to manipulate an official. Marshal, I hope I do not need to remind you of your duty?" {n}Giving Strachs a suspicious look, the prefect turns back to the documents.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们可以在罪名清单上加上一条新的指控——试图操纵帝国官员。您的职责所在，想必不需要我提醒吧，元帅？”{n}行政官狐疑地看了斯塔克斯一眼，之后将目光移回了卷宗上。{/n}

languages.text: «Se añadirá un nuevo cargo al registro: intento de manipular a un oficial. Mariscal, espero no tener que recordarle cuál es su deber». {n}La prefecta lanza una mirada suspicaz a Strachs antes de volver a fijarla en sus documentos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Let a new charge be added to the record: attempting to manipulate an official. Marshal, I hope I do not need to remind you of your duty?" {n}Giving Strachs a suspicious look, the prefect turns back to the documents.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Se añadirá un nuevo cargo al registro: intento de manipular a un oficial. Mariscal, espero no tener que recordarle cuál es su deber». {n}La prefecta lanza una mirada suspicaz a Strachs antes de volver a fijarla en sus documentos.{/n}

languages.text: 「新たな罪状を記録に加えます。官吏の操縦を試みた罪です。将帥、あなたの義務を改めて思い出させる必要がないように願いますが」{n}ストラッチスを疑わしげに一瞥すると、総監は書類に目を戻した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Let a new charge be added to the record: attempting to manipulate an official. Marshal, I hope I do not need to remind you of your duty?" {n}Giving Strachs a suspicious look, the prefect turns back to the documents.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「新たな罪状を記録に加えます。官吏の操縦を試みた罪です。将帥、あなたの義務を改めて思い出させる必要がないように願いますが」{n}ストラッチスを疑わしげに一瞥すると、総監は書類に目を戻した。{/n}

languages.text: "Bir yetkilinin aklını çelme girişimi de suç olarak kayıtlara geçsin! Miralay, vazifenizi hatırlatmama gerek yok sanıyorum." {n}Strachs'a şüpheli bir bakış atan prefekt, belgelerine geri dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Let a new charge be added to the record: attempting to manipulate an official. Marshal, I hope I do not need to remind you of your duty?" {n}Giving Strachs a suspicious look, the prefect turns back to the documents.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bir hükûmet yetkilisinin aklını çelme girişimi de suç olarak kayıtlara geçsin! Miralay, vazifenizi hatırlatmama gerek yok sanıyorum." {n}Strachs'a şüpheli bir bakış atan prefekt, belgelerine geri dönüyor.{/n}
